item.title: Life at Dwarves
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: We’re like-minded teammates who pursue ambitious goals with tech culture and codes of conduct. Build a place we love to work at We build this company like we build a product.

item.title: The more you challenge yourself, the more exciting it gets - An Tran
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: “I believe that on the journey to becoming a Senior Software Engineer, the more you challenge yourself, the more interesting things become.
